name: Survival Nation
abstract: An open-world online RPG survival game. You will kill zombies, acquire weapons, learn new skills, craft, explore the world, complete quests, and fight for survival in Solo, PVE and PVP modes.

detail.app_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, German, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, Italian, French
detail.app_release_note:
1.6.4 Hotfix:
- Adjusted ammo pouch position to prevent accidentally grabbing a weapon from holster
- Improved auto sprint, now it should be more convenient to use. You can walk by not tilting the thumbstick to max angle
- Now only animals bleed from arrows
- Fixed bug with broken bow after enabling UI while at full tension
- Fixed that player cannot enter new interiors using teleport movement
- Fixed some objects that haven't colliders
1.6:
- Added dual wielding of weapons (works only with weapon holsters)
- Added global voice chat - WalkieTalkie
- Added patch notes screen
- Now sprint is activated automatically - removed automatic sprint option from settings
- Fixed player needs related skills (hunger/thirst reduction)
- Fixed that player cannot craft higher-level coctails
- Fixed that player footsteps was without sound while running at a specific angle
- Fixed that items find while fishing weren't despawned
- Fixed multiplicated Batteries in save
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO 4 Pro
